alert.note: Alert for Wyandot (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 7:47PM EDT until June 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR SENECA...NORTHEASTERN WYANDOT AND NORTHWESTERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 747 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Riegel, or near Fostoria, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Tiffin, Fostoria, Bloomville, Sycamore, New Riegel, Benton, Republic and Bascom. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
